description: This Dart file defines a theme configuration for a Flutter application. It includes custom color constants in AppColors and a ThemeData instance in AppTheme that specifies styles for various UI components such as AppBar, Cards, Buttons, and Navigation Bar, using a consistent color scheme.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Container for color constants used in the app theme.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Defines the color scheme and theme data for the application, including styles for UI components.

methods.name: AppTheme.oceanProfessionalLight
methods.description: Provides a ThemeData object configured with the custom color scheme and styles for the 'Ocean Professional' light theme.
